thread.title: Miami DE Vernon fined $37,363 for Mariota hits
thread.title_full: Miami DE Vernon fined $37,363 for Mariota hits

title: Miami DE Vernon fined $37,363 for Mariota hits
text:
Miami DE Vernon fined $37,363 for Mariota hits; Titans QB sidelined THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   2:18   2:18   
People: 
New York (1742) 

NEW YORK â€” Miami Dolphins defensive end Olivier Vernon has been fined $37,363 by the NFL for two hits on Titans rookie quarterback Marcus Mariota. 
Vernon was docked for a pair of roughing-the-passer infractions. On the hit that hurt Mariota, Vernon was fined $17,363. He then was given a $20,000 fine for hitting Mariota in the head and neck area on another player. 
Mariota injured his left medial collateral ligament on Vernon's low hit and will not play this week against Atlanta. 
Also fined was Jaguars safety Johnathan Cyprien, who was flagged for a late hit on Texans QB Brian Hoyer and docked $8,681. 
AP NFL websites: http://www.pro32.ap.org and http://www.twitter.com/AP_NFL
